Contributor: Dulin, J. H., artist.; Devambez (Firm), publisher.;
Note: Signed "Lieut. J.H. Dulin." Date based on dates of U.S. participation in World War I. and months mentioned in text. "Visa No. 16325" appears on bottom left of the border. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text advertises Inter-Allied Games at Pershing Stadium in Paris, June 22-July 6. Illustration shows an athlete jumping over the flags of the allied countries.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
